param

Class MutablePMC

  • java.lang.Object
    • param.MutablePMC

  • final class MutablePMC
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of mutable parametric Markov chain. This class is intended to be used in combination with the StateEliminator, which uses this class to compute values of parametric Markov models.
    Author:
    Ernst Moritz Hahn (University of Oxford)
    See Also:
    StateEliminator

    • Constructor Detail

      • MutablePMC

        MutablePMC(FunctionFactory functionFactory,
           int numStates,
           boolean useRewards,
           boolean useTime)
        Constructs a new mutable parametric Markov chain.
        Parameters:
        functionFactory - function factory used to maintain rational functions
        numStates - total number of states this parametric Markov chain shall have
        useRewards - true iff parametric Markov chain constructed shall use rewards
        useTime - true iff parametric Markov chain constructed needs time entry

        Returns function factory maintaining functions used in this object.

        function factory maintaining functions

      • addTransition

        void addTransition(int from,
                   int to,
                   Function prob)
        Adds a probabilistic transition.
        Parameters:
        from - state transition starts from
        to - state transition leads to
        prob - probability of transition

      • getTransProb

        Function getTransProb(int from,
                      int to)
        Returns the probability of a given transition
        Parameters:
        from - source state of transition
        to - target state of transition
        Returns:
        probability to move from given state to given state

      • getSelfLoopProb

        Function getSelfLoopProb(int state)
        Returns probability of the self-loop in a given state.
        Parameters:
        state - state to return self-loop probability of
        Returns:
        self-loop probability of given state

      • makeAbsorbing

        void makeAbsorbing(int state)
        Makes a given state absorbing. This means removing all leaving transitions and adding a self-loop with probability one.
        Parameters:
        state - state to make absorbing

      • setInitState

        void setInitState(int state,
                  boolean targetState)
        Sets whether given state shall be an initial state
        Parameters:
        state - state which shall or shall not be an initial state
        targetState - true iff given state shall be an initial state
